title: gabl.ink content JSON schema
description: schema for gabl.ink content JSON files

base.description: [string] the part of the item’s ID after the last slash

date.description: [objects] calendar dates for the item (in America/Denver time)

published.description: [object] calendar date of the item’s first publication (in America/Denver time)

day.description: [integer] day of the month of the item’s first publication (in America/Denver time)

month.description: [integer] number of the month of the item’s first publication (in America/Denver time)

year.description: [integer] calendar year of the item’s first publication (in America/Denver time)

revised.description: [object] calendar date of the item’s last revision (in America/Denver time)

day.description: [integer] day of the month of the item’s first publication (in America/Denver time)

month.description: [integer] number of the month of the item’s first publication (in America/Denver time)

year.description: [integer] calendar year of the item’s first publication (in America/Denver time)
